title: Listening to Quran while going to sleep & sleeping while Quran is playing- assim al hakeem
transcript: what's the ruling on listening to quran while sleeping every day i you julie play the quran in bed and sleep off while it's still playing is this considered disrespectful the answer is no there is no disrespect in this none whatsoever going to bed while listening to the quran and falling asleep while the quran is being played is totally permissible and there's nothing wrong in that and allah azza knows best
